dct_title_s: Plan of Lhasa / by L.A. Waddell, Lt.Colonel, I.M.S.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Includes : Reference  to Lieut.-Colonel L. A. Waddell's Plan of Lhasa. Map was compiled from  information given byTibetans. Shows landmarks, gardens, marsh fields, sandy plains; and relevant buildings are located. Map shows "Circular Road." Companion volume is available from RECAP: Call number: 1727 .949. A printed copy of this map is in volume.
